channel.title: AuralCandy.Net
channel.description: All flavours of premium house music from phat disco beats to deep grooves, brought to you by DJs MK-Ultra and Mesmic.
channel.copyright: Teemu Tammela, AuralCandy.Net 2008 - 2012. All rights reserved.
channel.itunes:author: AuralCandy.Net
channel.itunes:subtitle: All flavours of premium house music from phat disco beats to deep grooves, brought to you by DJs MK-Ultra and Mesmic.
